name: SHIVER ME TIMBERS!
description:
SHIVER ME TIMBERS is a high paced adventure co-op game!

you have to play together to defeat the powerful kraken that destroys your ship.

The game was created as an assignment in "Game Jam" course as part of visual communications bachelor's degree, At Bezalel academy of arts and design.

Created by

Programmers: Shlomi Adelman & Tal Joseph

Designers: Ori Tirosh & Shaked keti Zhaor 

Original music by: Amin Florid
